reviewText: great Book, all youneed to know about shooting a traditional bow
I have been an archer most of my life.  GREAT DVD.  Watch and learn there is something in here for everyone.
The Best info presented in a very easy to understand manner!
Excellent source of information. He covers it all from A to Z. Simple and direct there is no doubt Ferguson knows his stuff.
I didn't know quite a few of the tips included here, what I really liked is that he didn't rush thru anything, he answered questions you're already asking to yourself.
